title: TAIT Perpetual Calendar—Red
description:
The TAIT Perpetual Calendar was created to be used year after year. Designed with inspiration from vintage volvelles, simply move the three circles to mark the date and month. The calendar is hand screen printed in three classic colors on 50 pt. raw kraft chipboard sourced from Michigan and finished with wooden maple ends and a hanging ribbon. This calendar looks beautiful in the home, office, or at the local cafe.

  • Dimensions: 15.5 x23.5 in.
  • Materials: 50 pt. raw kraft chipboard, hard maple wood, grosgrain ribbon
